name: employee-survey-platform
description: Employee Survey Platform - A feedback management system

scripts.watch: nodemon --watch . --ext html,css,js --ignore node_modules/ --ignore build/ --exec "npm run surge:deploy"
scripts.watch-test: nodemon --watch . --ext html,css,js --ignore node_modules/ --ignore build/ --exec "npm run surge:deploy-test"
scripts.auto-deploy: npm run surge:deploy && npm run watch
scripts.auto-deploy-test: npm run surge:deploy-test && npm run watch-test
scripts.full-deploy: npm run build && npm run surge:deploy
